titleStmt.title: A prospective glasse for the revolters at sea, and new malignants at land: being a letter sent from Sir Anthony Saintleger, an attendant on the Prince, to a person of quality in Colchester. Where by may bee clearly discerned how the Prince doth intend to land the sea-men, and ship the land-men that have served the Parliament against the King, and now serve the King against the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Saint-Leger, Anthony, Sir, d. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
